Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.NameEnumeration
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.UserHandle
    as of 3.3.0, use Identity instead
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.NameEnumerationTable
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Message.correlationIDAt(int)
    As of 3.2.1, use Message.correlationID(int)
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Service.createAdminEvent()
    as of 3.7.0, use Service.createPublishEvent() instead Create an Admin Event suitable for publishing to this Service. Use an EventFormatter to add Messages to the Event and set fields.
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.ProviderSession.createTopic(Message)
    as of 3.4.0, use ProviderSession.createTopicsAsync(TopicList, ResolveMode, Identity) or ProviderSession.createTopics(TopicList, ResolveMode, Identity) instead Creates a new Topic object based on the specified 'message'. The 'message' must be one of the following types: TOPIC_STATUS or RESOLUTION_STATUS. Returns null if the 'message' was not valid.
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.AbstractSession.createUserHandle()
    as of 3.3.0, use AbstractSession.createIdentity() instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.SessionOptions.getDefaultServices()
    as of 3.7.0, use SessionOptions.getDefaultSubscriptionService() instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Constant.getValueAsDate()
    since 3.2.1 Use Constant.getValueAsDatetime() instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Constant.getValueAsTime()
    since 3.2.1 Use Constant.getValueAsDatetime() instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Datetime.isValidField(int)
    use Datetime.hasParts(int)
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Operation.requestType()
    as of 3.2.1, use Operation.requestDefinition() instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Operation.responseType()
    As of new release, replaced by Operation.numResponseDefinitions() and Operation.responseDefinition(int)
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.AbstractSession.sendAuthorizationRequest(Request, UserHandle, CorrelationID)
    as of 3.3.0, use AbstractSession.sendAuthorizationRequest(Request, Identity, CorrelationID) instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.AbstractSession.sendAuthorizationRequest(Request, UserHandle, CorrelationID, String)
    as of 3.3.0, use AbstractSession.sendAuthorizationRequest(Request, Identity, CorrelationID, String) instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.AbstractSession.sendAuthorizationRequest(Request, UserHandle, EventQueue, CorrelationID)
    as of 3.3.0, use AbstractSession.sendAuthorizationRequest(Request, Identity, EventQueue, CorrelationID) instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.AbstractSession.sendAuthorizationRequest(Request, UserHandle, EventQueue, CorrelationID, String)
    as of 3.3.0, use AbstractSession.sendAuthorizationRequest(Request, Identity, EventQueue, CorrelationID, String) instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Session.sendRequest(Request, UserHandle, CorrelationID)
    as of 3.3.0, use Session.sendRequest(Request, Identity, CorrelationID) instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Session.sendRequest(Request, UserHandle, CorrelationID, String)
    as of 3.3.0, use Session.sendRequest(Request, Identity, CorrelationID, String) instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Session.sendRequest(Request, UserHandle, EventQueue, CorrelationID)
    as of 3.3.0, use Session.sendRequest(Request, Identity, EventQueue, CorrelationID) instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Session.sendRequest(Request, UserHandle, EventQueue, CorrelationID, String)
    as of 3.3.0, use Session.sendRequest( Request, Identity, EventQueue, CorrelationID, String) instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Session.subscribe(SubscriptionList, UserHandle)
    as of 3.3.0, use Session.subscribe(SubscriptionList, Identity) instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Session.subscribe(SubscriptionList, UserHandle, String)
    as of 3.3.0, use Session.subscribe(SubscriptionList, Identity, String) instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Subscription.subscriptionStatus()
    as of 3.12.1, use Session.subscriptionStatus() instead.
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Session.unsubscribe(CorrelationID)
    as of 3.2.2 Use AbstractSession.cancel(CorrelationID) instead
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Element.valueIsNull(int)
    As of 3.2.1, replaced by Element.isNullValue(int)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.bloomberglp.blpapi.EventDispatcher(int, int)
    As of release 3.1.0.0 use SessionOptions.setMaxEventQueueSize(int) for setting the event queue size per session
